      • load

        public static Document load(java.net.URI uri)
                     throws java.io.IOException,
                            JobException
        Load the document. The import format is determined by the file extension, and if it is not Document.EXTENSION, it is converted appropriately
        Parameters:
        uri - the input URI
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - on error
        JobException

        Parameters:

        master - the job master to use
